        public static void printRecipes(java.lang.String type,
                                java.lang.String label,
                                int time,
                                int cal)
        print out the titles of recipes that fit the user's criteria
        Parameters:
        type - a string that describes the type (appetizer, entree, soup, salad) of the dish
        label - a string that describes the restrictions (vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, dairy-free) of the dish
        time - an int that describes the maximum amount of time in minutes that the user can cook
        cal - an int that describes the maximum amount of calories per serving no return

      • changeServings

        public static double changeServings(int index,
                                    int servings)
        multiplies the quantities of ingredients by a factor so that user will know how much to add for the number of servings they need to make
        Parameters:
        index - the index (int) of the recipe
        servings - the number of servings the user needs to make
        Returns:
        the factor by which all quantities must be multiplied

      • chooseMore

        public static boolean chooseMore()
        ask the user if they want the instructions to make a different recipe no parameters
        Returns:
        true if they want to get the instructions for a different recipe, false if they don't

      • more

        public static boolean more()
        ask the user if they want to enter a different set of criteria to find new recipes no parameters
        Returns:
        true if they want to enter more criteria, false if they do not, program ends if false
